question: A student investigates the effect of temperature on the distance a caterpillar travels in one minute. The student performs the investigation at four different times of day using one caterpillar. This experiment could be improved if the student
candidate_answers: (A) uses more than one caterpillar. (B) performs the investigation on a wet surface. (C) uses earthworms instead of caterpillars. (D) performs the investigation at the same time on four days.
answer: performs the investigation at the same time on four days.
label: D
